name: Eye4fraud for Woocommerce
author: Eye4Fraud

sections.description:
Eye4Fraud Online Fraud Protection Software
by eye4fraud

Guaranteed Chargeback Protection
Increased Revenue

Say No to Fraudulent Transactions

We created Eye4Fraud to protect online eCommerce merchants from fraudulent financial transactions. Deceitful transactions cost you time, energy, and money. You end up with disgruntled customers. Avoid tedious manual verification processes and provide outstanding customer satisfaction when reducing erroneous declines. Mitigating risks equals sublime customer service and enhanced consumer loyalty.

Eye4Fraud Offers 100% Chargeback Guarantee

If a chargeback occurs on an Eye4Fraud approved account, we will reimburse you for the total chargeback amount – no minimum volume required. You can rest assured that you are in safe hands with your dealings.

Only Pay for Orders You Ship

Customize workflows according to your company’s needs. Pick and choose which orders Eye4Fraud screens. Exclude non-credit card payments such as PayPal, Amazon, Apple Pay or set minimum value orders.

You Are in Control

We offer free, comprehensive customizations tailored to your requirements. We understand that every business is unique, and so are their needs. Do you want to exclude a payment method or customer group? We can help you completely customize for free. Our seasoned experts are here to customize a solution at no extra cost.

Why Choose Eye4Fraud?

We offer avant-garde solutions that give you protection at all times. We want to eliminate the risk factors to support you scale up your business, broaden sales, and ship internationally with confidence.

Unique Offers from Eye4Fraud

· Delivers phone order screening
· Provides unmatched call and email support
· Involves flexible pricing plans
· Supplies free trials with complete protection
· Gives a 100% chargeback guarantee
· Refunds chargebacks within 24 hours

Eye4Fraud Showcases Industry’s Best Customer Service

Eye4Fraud’s unique selling point in customer service is our human touch. You get to connect with real human beings. You don’t need to create a ticket or wait in line to speak with a human. Nor do you require to deal with the monotonous hassles of communicating with a Bot.

Software Requirements

Requires minimum PHP version: 7.0

Get Started

Install now to protect yourself from frauds!

short_description: This plugin is an add-on for WooCommerce plugin that help you to screen your order transaction, such as credit card transaction, for online fraud
